content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, thank you for considering renting my apartment. I'm sure it will be a great fit for you. Can you please propose a rental price that you are comfortable with?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to know the monthly rental price of your apartment. Can you please tell me?

I am willing to negotiate the price and would like to discuss any additional fees or charges that may apply.

Please let me know if that is possible.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Certainly, Juan. The monthly rental price for my apartment is 1,500 Euros. However, I am open to discussing any additional fees or charges that may apply. Would you like to discuss those as well?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1,500 Euros per month. Can we discuss any additional fees or charges that may apply?

I am a responsible and dependable tenant, so I would like to know if there are any rules or restrictions that I should be aware of.

Also, can you please tell me how long the lease agreement will be?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Great, Juan. I'm glad you agree to the rental price of 1,500 Euros per month. As for additional fees or charges, there may be a security deposit of one month's rent due at the time of signing the lease agreement. There may also be a maintenance fee of 50 Euros per month to cover any repairs or maintenance costs.

As for rules and restrictions, I ask that you keep the apartment clean and in good condition, and that you do not make any modifications to the apartment without my prior approval. Additionally, smoking and pets are prohibited.

The lease agreement will be for a term of one year, with the option to renew for another year if both parties agree.

Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
